query: for e in edges filter e.type=="hasParticipant" for ev in events filter e._from==ev._id return distinct { id:ev._key, content:ev.name, article:ev.article, start:HAS(ev.timestamp, "start")==true ? DATE_FORMAT(ev.timestamp.start, "%yyyy-%mm-%dd") : DATE_FORMAT(ev.timestamp, "%yyyy-%mm-%dd"), end:HAS(ev.timestamp, "end")==true ? DATE_FORMAT(ev.timestamp.end, "%yyyy-%mm-%dd") : null}
